did.abstract: Incidental photographs from within the manuscript collection covering major events, labor actions, significant leaders.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Joint Board, Fur, Leather & Machine Workers Union Photographs #5685 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: news clippings -- located in Map case, items too large for a box

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 17th Biennial Convention, International Fur and Leather Workers Union of the United States and Canada, CIO, Steel Pier, Atlantic City, N.J., May 16-22, 1948 ; Eighteenth Biennial Convention, International Fur and Leather Workers Union, United States and Canada, May 1950, Atlantic City, N.J. -- removed from Mapcase 27 and photos were placed in 1OP, they are too long for panoramic box 203
